definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Anonymous. " Woodruff introduced the six bottle carton in 1923."
sentences.chinese: 伍德拉夫介紹了六瓶紙箱於1923年。

sentences.english: All the cartons are lined with plastic sheets， so they're absolutely water-proof， I can assure you.
sentences.chinese: 所有紙箱都內襯塑料袋，我可以保證絕對防水。

sentences.english: The cardboard box is provided with a plurality of hatches and a rift. The rift is connected with the hatch.
sentences.chinese: 紙箱具有多個開口和一隙縫，該隙縫連接開口。

sentences.english: PE Packer is used for paper box, paper case, color printing corporation, etc.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙烯自動打包機用於紙盒，紙箱彩色印刷公司。

sentences.english: The eggs are packed in cartons with beehives lined with shake-proof paper board.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋要用帶蜂房孔，外襯防震紙板的紙箱包裝。

sentences.english: We have now adopted carton packing instead of wooden cases.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在採用紙箱包裝而不用木箱。

sentences.english: We suggest that you reinforce the cartons with twice belts.
sentences.chinese: 我方建議用兩跟包裝帶加固紙箱。

sentences.english: The product external packing is carton packing.
sentences.chinese: 產品外包裝爲紙箱包裝。

sentences.english: But I think Such shirts packed in cardboard cartons can save freight cost.
sentences.chinese: 但是我認爲使用硬紙箱包裝這批襯衣可以節省運費。

sentences.english: The canned goods are to be packed in carton with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 罐狀貨物在紙箱裏，外面加兩道箍。

sentences.english: Characters and patterns come out clearly and smartly with prompt dry off; suitable for manufacture of large-size cartons.
sentences.chinese: 印刷圖案文字精美，乾燥快，適合大型紙箱製作。

sentences.english: Our products mainly cover aluminum flexible tubes and cartons for packing.
sentences.chinese: 本公司主要生產鋁質軟管及包裝用紙箱。

sentences.english: It is available in Brass Plated Black polymer, nickel, zinc etc. on reels or cartons.
sentences.chinese: 它採用黃銅鍍黑聚合物，鎳，鋅等對轆或紙箱。

sentences.english: The formation of the current carton packaging machinery more advanced equipment.
sentences.chinese: 形成目前較爲先進的紙箱包裝機械設備。

sentences.english: Thee canned goods are to be packed in cartons with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 罐裝貨物在紙箱裏，外面加兩道箍。

definition: to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
BRIC/BRICS economic bloc (Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa)
junk/items of no value/various bits and bobs
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
the only son of a family/(functional programming or philosophy) monad
